original_title: Democrat sanctuary leaders defy Trump admin ultimatum: 'No intention of changing' | Fox News
article_summary: U.S. Attorney General Pam Bondi issues deadline for sanctuary cities and states to comply with federal immigration laws, sparking defiance from states like Washington, who vow not to change their immigrant-friendly policies despite threats of legal action. Washington Governor Bob Ferguson responds by asserting the state's commitment to welcoming immigrants and preparedness to defend against any litigation.</s>
